values.text: Thanks for your patience. Kindly enter your issue once again. Try using a couple of words stating your issue together(Eg: Power failure/lamp not working. Also try the same words once more if your first answer is not satisfactory).
"<?$webhook_result_1.passages[0].passage_text?>"
"<?$webhook_result_1.passages[1].passage_text?>"
"<?$webhook_result_1.passages[2].passage_text?>"

generic.title: We suggest that you try typing your query once more before moving on to our representatives. Handover to a representative?

values.text: That's good to hear!
Book, cancel or modify your appointment with our consultants here
Sorry we didn't quite get you! Please type in English since I do not understand other languages.
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
Would you like to speak to our representative?
Sorry but we are trying our best to help. Please be patient.
We understand that we are unable to help you. Do you want to contact a representative from the company?
Kindly refrain from using negative statements. They are sad to hear :(
We are specialized in refrigerators. We offer Single Door, Double Door, Multi Door as well as Side by Side refrigerators
View our product catalog here.
You can contact us via the following methods
Email: customercare.in@abc.com
Phone(Toll free): 800-9999999
Hello! Nice to meet you.
We have branches in Ernakulam, Thrissur and Thiruvananthapuram. Visit the link below to find the store closest to you!
Store locater
Hope you are satisfied. Thank you for choosing us!
Kindly state the issue you are facing clearly.
Eg: The light inside the fridge is not working
We are open from 8:30am to 5:30pm, Monday to Saturday. Lunch break from 2pm to 3pm. The store remains closed on Sundays.
Hello! Welcome to our customer care. I can help you find our working hours, nearest store, book an appointment and also clear your queries about our products.
How can I help you?
